Values.LIST_OF_QUERIESWITHSUPPORTINGDATA: {"LONG_QUERY_PSQL_STRING":"SELECT datname as Database, pid as Process_ID, usename as Username, query,client_hostname,state, now() - query_start as Query_Duration, now() - backend_start as Session_Duration FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE age(clock_timestamp(),query_start) > interval '{0} minutes' AND state like 'active' AND usename NOT like 'postgres' ORDER BY 1 desc;","LIST_OF_PROCESSES":"select now()-query_start as Running_Since,pid,client_hostname,client_addr, usename, state, left(query,60) as query_text from pg_stat_activity;"}
